name: HeavenzHellz
description:
Heavenz&Hellz is a classic "tic tac toe"-clone, also known as nuts and bolts.
You can either play against the computer in the single-player-mode or against a friend in multiplayer-mode. Just choose if you like to play as angel or as devil, angel goes first, then try to set three of your symbols in a line and you win. Have fun!
